description:
Palm Hot Apps Winner and Bright Hub's Top Business App! BillMyTime is a full-featured app for managing your billable hours and expenses.

Main Features:
- Generate fees and expenses
- Store all your client information
- Import clients using Google Docs
- Create categories for easy billing
- Time billable tasks
- Input timesheets
- Generate customized reports
- Export reports directly to Google Docs, or as an e-mail in a table or CSV format

More Information:
Visit superfluinc.com for more screenshots and information, as well as details about the latest updates. BillMyTime is available in English & French.
